summary: A simple red-and-white retexture of ship sails.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/UJ12AJk.png[/img][/center]
[center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65163/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/QtD7v94.png[/img][/url][/center]

This is a very simple retexture I made some time ago, after asking in the Nexus forums for a retexture of the ship sails around Skyrim to have red and white stripes like those cool Viking longships you see on TV. Nobody stepped up, so I took the time to do it myself. I know these may be kind of stereotypical, but I think they look rather nice, so I'll leave them here in case someone else may want to have them as well.

To install, extract the contents of your downloaded file to your "Steam/SteamApps/Common/Skyrim/Data" folder. That's it, no esp required. This will affect all ships, including the Red Wave and The Katariah, if I remember correctly.

It's pretty obvious from the watermarks all over the images, but the stock pictures I used for inspiration - and to fill up the image slots on the mod page - were made by Paul Moore at [url=http://www.dreamstime.com/diomedes66_info]Dreamstime.com[/url]. Have fun!


[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/UJ12AJk.png[/img][/center]
author: Jokerine
